name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn
the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.

This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding
about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three
brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.

name: Sommelier's Secrets
description:
The origins of wine remain shrouded in mystery. Civilizations have flourished
and generations have evolved since, but we have barely managed to decode the
intricacies of one of the oldest alcoholic beverages known to mankind.

This wine tasting trail will take you on an immersive journey of tasting and
appreciating 6 fabulous wines, sprinkled with the most interesting stories to
help you understand the culture and nuances of the spirit.

**This Wine Tasting will comprise a guided tasting of 6 wines from around the
world with varying styles and structures, emphasising on sustainable wine
making practices.**

name: Oasis Of Scents
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Wonders of Horology
description:
Delve into the enchanting world of watchmaking, and gain a deeper
understanding about the stellar craftsmanship and intricate detailing that go
into the making of luxe time pieces.

This experience will have you discover the nuanced art and science of watch-
making, and help you look at time from a whole new perspective under the
guidance of an expert horologist.

_**The experience includes navigating through various components of Time
Making, the intricacies of Fine Watchmaking in an immersive visual journey
under the guidance of an expert.**_

name: Spin City
description:
While the origin story of pole art is multifaceted, spanning across multiple
cultures and time periods, today pole dance is regarded as an art form
celebrated for its fusion of athleticism, grace, and creativity.

_**This experience is an immersion into the art of pole movement, looking
beyond its association with strip clubs to embracing it as a wonderful way to
move and stay fit.**_

name: Gourmet Cookalong
description:
Drawing inspiration from community dining and the pleasures of deep diving
into the art of cooking and dining well, this experience helps you engage all
five senses when you're in the kitchen. The caviar on the top is relishing a
wonderful meal that you, along with a bunch of people, will cook together.  
  
**_The theme for this cookalong is Japanese cuisine - Sushi making. _**

  * **The cookalong** :

**Observe:** Our expert will demonstrate how to roll three types of sushi from
scratch: Maki, uramaki, and temaki sushi.  

**Make Your Own Sushi:** Learn to make four types of sushi from scratch using
various fillings and rolling styles, as demonstrated by the chef and savour
them.

_Note:_ The cookalong and the meal will include both vegetarian (exotic
vegetables and yasai vegetables) and non-vegetarian (salmon and crab) options.

Additionally, all guests will be served asparagus tempura and pickled
vegetables.

name: Polar Plunge
description:
Cold plunges have a rich history, dating back to ancient civilisations like
Egypt, Greece, and Rome, where it was revered for its healing properties.
Today, this practice is globally recognised for its numerous therapeutic and
wellness benefits.

A cold plunge, also known as an ice bath, involves immersing the body in cold
water, typically at temperatures between 5-7°C, for a brief period. It is
widely used by athletes and fitness enthusiasts to aid recovery and enhance
physical and mental health.

_**This immersive experience helps you take the plunge through a series of
activities, guided by an expert.**_

location.name: Runway 27
location.address: Yemalur, Off Old Airport Road, Bangalore

name: Summit Seekers
description:
Stemming from an age-old human desire to reach new heights, rock climbing is
beyond just a fitness ritual. This beginner-friendly rock climbing experience
draws inspiration from climbing pioneers, the unending human quest to problem-
solve better and design thinking to equip you with the skills and confidence
to embark on your own climbing journey. Join us and discover a sport steeped
in storytelling, where the upward journey is as beautiful as the summit.

name: Layers of Decadence
description:
Tiramisu, meaning "pick me up" in Italian, was crafted to be as uplifting as
its name suggests. Some myths trace it back to the 17th century, when a
similar dessert called Duke’s Soup was made for Grand Duke Cosimo III de’
Medici, but the tiramisu we know today took shape much later.

Originally more of a custard than a cake, tiramisu evolved into its signature
layered form, with espresso-soaked biscuits and creamy mascarpone. Over the
years, it has become a global favourite, loved for its rich yet airy texture
and simple, no-bake process.

_**Join our Tiramisu Making Experience and master the art of crafting this
classic Italian dessert from scratch. Learn key techniques, from achieving the
perfect mascarpone texture to balancing flavors, and assemble your tiramisu
step by step. Take home your handcrafted treat to enjoy and share.**_  

_**Note: The experience includes egg/eggless options.**_

name: Glass Gardens
description:
Imagine our world, shrunk to fit inside a bottle. In 19th century England, a
chance encounter with a tenacious fern sparked an idea, that of a terrarium.
Today, these self-sustaining havens encapsulate a tiny piece of the great
outdoors, indoors, and are a testament to human ingenuity and nature's
resilience.

_**This immersive experience delves into the world of terrariums and plant
care. Participants get to make and take home their own terrarium.**_

_**Note: Participants will create a Self-Sustaining Nature Terrarium in a Jar
with tropical plants.**_
